column5: Hi Guys, I hear alot of talk about how hot the walleye fishing is right now in Erie. Does anyone know where a decent spot is?  Is the distance from shore walkable? One guy told me they were getting them in 4 ft. Are they getting them in the ports?  Thanks,  Mark
I catch most of mine out in the deep trolling but they do catch the odd one off the pier in Port Maitland at the mouth of the Grand River and up and down the river shore.
